string.text:
A mounted head of a Boar; a massive mutated animal found commonly within the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A trophy of a Boar; a massive mutated animal found commonly within the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A trophy of a Blind Dog; the most familiar representative of the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A mounted head of the feared Bloodsucker.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A trophy of a Bloodsucker; a semi-legendary beast feared across the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A trophy of a Zone cat. Cats in the Zone are heavily mutated local wildcats.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A trophy of a Chimera; hairless monsters, close to the size of an adult lion.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A trophy of a Flesh; a heavily mutated pig.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A Pseudodog trophy; one of the Zone's most dangerous mutant species.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A bundle of tattered pages filled with cryptic notes and diagrams.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A set of wooden cabinets, commonly located within a kitchen.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A simple ash tray for disposle of cigarette and cigar ashes.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

An empty metal barrel. What it used to hold is a mystery.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A set of rugged shelves likely taken from a bathroom.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A worn biliard table. The chance of finding a decent set of cue sticks, let alone a full set of billiard balls is unlikely though.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A cast iron cooking pot. Clearly used but still in great condition.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A rugged soviet countertop still in usable condition.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A birch cutting board, scarred from years of potato slicing.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A modern-looking chair that seems to be in excellent condition.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

An old board game with most of the pieces missing.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

An empty Jerrycan that smells faintly of gasoline.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A wooden target for times when you need to zero in your sights before going out into the field or take out some built-up frustration.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

An old milk can that smells suspiciously like moonshine vodka.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

An empty gas tank once used for cooking or heating.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A framed photo of a group of military men with their faces obscured.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

With a snapped truss rod and a lifting bridge, the only use for this guitar is ornamental.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A small and rubust wooden stool. The finish has seen better days, but it's perfectly functional.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
An old, metal table. If you ignore the rust, it functions just fine. %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:\n %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable\n

An old, metal table likely originally used within a factory of sorts. Though rusty, it still functions as a fine table. The displays and gauges have long since been deemeed unfunctional.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A tattered "Sunrise" Stalker suit. It can be used only for decoration.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A tattered Mercenary LC suit. It can be used only for decoration.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

An exoskeleton with a completely destroyed electrical system. It can be used only for decoration.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

An old soviet stretcher likely nabbed from a clinic or hospital. If you ignore the stains, it can double as somewhere to get some reset if better options are unavailable.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A pile of broken AKS-74 parts.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A rusted old teapot from before the Chernobyl accident. Not recomended for use due to possible radiation contamination.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A shorted-out experimental psi-helmet pulled from a zombified stalker. Results noted.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A stack of military documents too mundane to be valuable to those otherwise interested.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

An empty spiral notebook that could be used as a journal to record findings within the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A Russian copy of John "Lofty" Wiseman's "SAS Survival Handbook"
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A Russian work called "The Basics of Small Arms Cartridge Design."
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A Russian work called "The Manufacture of Gears"
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A broken seal has rendered this LLMC useful only as a decoration.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A stand with an SSP-99M heavy-duty scientific suit. For display purposes only.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

An old Soviet poster that reads "PEACE AND FRIENDSHIP!" and "OUR EXPERIENCE IS SHARED WITH OUR FRIENDS!"
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A promotional poster from a film.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A promotional poster from a film.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

An old Soviet poster that reads "WE STRIKE THE SLACKERS!"
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A promotional poster from a film.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A promotional poster from a film.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A promotional poster from a film.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A sink likely taken from an old house or restroom somewhere in the Zone. Bandits are ruthless looters, and have been known to take even the kitchen sink.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A worn side table taken from an abandoned building.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A worn side table taken from an abandoned building.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A stack of three large metal storage shelves.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

While most wooden crates found in the Zone can be broken into with relative ease, some prove to be almost impossible to destroy.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

The humble cardboard box, in which many smuggled Zone supplies arrive, is often kept in case of future need. An extremely light and cheap method of storing a few items.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Item Storage
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A rugged, high-quality optical microscope that proves useful to scientists studying the Zone. The microstructures of anomalous artefacts have proven to be incredibly interesting.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A large map of the Great Swamps area.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A large map of the center of the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A makeshift grave marker in the shape of an Orthodox Christian cross. Includes a Stalker's respirator.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A makeshift grave marker in the shape of a cross.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

An ingenious device or electrical fire in the making.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A pile of several stacks of 5000-Ruble bills.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A crude artificial plant created by a Stalker out of electrical insulation cloth. It's not known whether it was made as a work of art or to sell to a very gullible artefact buyer.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A small plant potted in an aluminum bean can. For all living things in the Zone, life finds a way.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A plant potted in an old Soviet canister. For all living things in the Zone, life finds a way.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A worn and tattered soviet rug. In need of a good dusting but can be just what you need to really bring a room together.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 
 %c[ui_red]WARNING: DO NOT DROP FROM INVENTORY; WILL CAUSE CTD

An old piece of Soviet clinical equipment. Unlikely to be functional anymore, but looks fancy nonetheless.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A thin plywood barrier that can be used to separate two areas of a room.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A storage container useful for organizing your goodies and stashing your loot.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Item Storage
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A large storage container useful for organizing your goodies and stashing your loot.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Item Storage
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A small metal box, likely of military origin.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Item Storage
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A small safe that can be used to store a few valuables.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Item Storage
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A worn, but usable metal toolbox. Reading the side, it seems to have come from a car factory.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Item Storage
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A reinforced metal foot locker painted green. Potentially taken from a military installation.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Item Storage
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A tall, thin container from a gym or school. Perfect for storing stalker suits, but can be used for anything.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Item Storage
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A very large safe that can be used to store many valuables.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Item Storage
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A panel assembled from wooden planks. Useful when boarding up a window.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Block Windows/Entrances

A plank of wood. Can be used to block entrances and fortify a location.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Block Windows/Entrances

A section of tin roofing that could be used to cover up a window.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Block Windows/Entrances

A barrier crudely assembled from scrap metal. While clearly not bulletproof, it can protect from mutants, or at least provide concealment.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A ceramic toilet missing its seat. Without running water in the Zone, it only serves as a reminder of the luxuries of the outside world.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A very rusty showerhead. Could be connected to a tank of water for a functioning shower.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A very old box-style TV set. It still works, but there's no TV signal to pick up in the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A lamp that hangs out from the wall. Useful for lighting outdoor areas.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Fuel: %c[ui_gray_2]Batteries

A projecting light from a theater or auditorium.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Fuel: %c[ui_gray_2]Batteries

A small but surprisingly powerful ceiling-mounted light.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Fuel: %c[ui_gray_2]Batteries

A simple arrangement consisting of a battery-powered light bulb hanging on a string.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Fuel: %c[ui_gray_2]Batteries

A ceiling-mounted box with three fluorescent tube lights and a battery pack.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Fuel: %c[ui_gray_2]Batteries

A light bulb in a protective cage.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Fuel: %c[ui_gray_2]Batteries

A large, yellow light bulb in a protective cage.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Fuel: %c[ui_gray_2]Batteries

A single fluorescent tube light crudely connected to a battery.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Fuel: %c[ui_gray_2]Batteries
